attributes.action: Call for Action on North Korea's Human Right Abuse
attributes.additional_details:
Britain and the international community must act on the overwhelming evidence that crimes against humanity are being committed in North Korea.

The UN report released on February 2014, details compelling evidence of torture, execution and arbitrary imprisonment, deliberate starvation and an almost complete lack of free thought and belief.

Add your voice to this call for action.

Guardian article:
http://www.theguardian.com/world/2014/feb/17/north-korea-human-rights-abuses-united-nations

BBC article:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-26220304

Telegraph article:
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/northkorea/10645015/North-Korea-10-starkest-paragraphs-from-UN-report.html

UN-Report:
http://www.ohchr.org/EN/HRBodies/HRC/CoIDPRK/Pages/ReportoftheCommissionofInquiryDPRK.aspx
